PAD_Recognized.synopsis: PAD when the players have recognised the Dark Justiciar corpses in Ketheric City as belonging to Shar soldiers AND they heard from Halsin about the way to Moonrise towers through an Underground fortress.

PAD_Recognized_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Recognized_0.text: Either way, these corpses prove one thing: this is the city Halsin mentioned.
